attributes.action: We call upon HM Government to respect the will of the people of the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the  United kingdom have voted to leave the EU in the Referendum 
We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that the HM Government will not call a Second referendum and respect the will of the people of the U.K.
attributes.background:
The people of the  United kingdom have voted to leave the EU in the Referendum 
We call upon HM Government to respect the will of the people of the U.K. And not call A second referendum on the EU
